bio:
Captain Hargar, a Nord man, is an officer in the Blackblood Marauders bandit group. He wears leather armor and leather boots. He is bald and clean-shaven. He has vein-like patterned tattos on both sides of his neck and face.
The Blackblood Marauders are led by Jaree-Ra (an Argonian) and his sister Deeja living in the cave at Broken Oar Grotto, north of Solitude. Hargar resides in a ship in the Grotto that became stuck after a cave-in. Hargar’s personal stash can be found in the adjacent sunken ship.
Hargar recently escaped from the Solitude dungeon within Castle Dour, of which Ahtar (a Redguard man) is the jailor.
name: Captain Hargar
